original_text: From the Negev he went from place to place until he came to Bethel, to the place between Bethel and Ai where his tent had been earlier
korean_text: 그가 네게브에서부터 길을 떠나 벧엘에 이르며 벧엘과 아이 사이 곧 전에 장막 쳤던 곳에 이르니

sentences.original_text: From the Negev he went from place to place
to the place between Bethel and Ai
where his tent had been earlier
